text:
manyA#saiq Sa~jca#naH kRudhi | 
kratvEq dakShA#ya nO hinuq praNaq AyU(gm)#Shi tAriShaH || 
anu# manyatA-manuqmanya#mAnA praqjAva#nta(gm) raqyimakShI#yamANaM | 
tasyai# vaqya(gm) hEDa#siq mA&pi# BUmaq sA nO# dEqvI suqhavAq Sarma# yacCatu || 
yasyA#miqdaM praqdiSiq yadviqrOcaqtE&nu#matiqM prati# BUShantyAqyava#H | 
yasyA# uqpastha# uqrva#ntari#kShaq(gm)q sA nO# dEqvI suqhavAq Sarma# yacCatu || 35
